title: FPS Dropping Causing a Lag in the Game?
body:
Just as a note, I'm running on Windows 7 Professional and everything is up to date. 

My FPS has been going from around 120 then dropping to 40-50 randomly throughout the game. When it does this it's like a lag spike but it's only the animation of my champ (spells take 2-3 seconds to work after I've already clicked them, champion doesn't move for a couple seconds, etc.). I've noticed it mostly on Summoners Rift (both the winter and regular map) and in a couple Arams as well. 
There's been times my champion just runs towards the enemy team then just stands there. I try clicking around and I cannot move at all (everything else is still moving in real time, I just can't move my champion). 

My ping has been a steady 50 throughout the game so it's not an internet issue. This also started happening with the newer patch, I didn't have any issue like this before that. 

Does anyone know of a fix for this issue? Or is it a server issue that we're just going to have to patiently wait for Rito to fix?

replies.body: So Fun story short, the issue has yet to be resolved. I've followed everything that the support team asked me to do and it has yet to fix the problem. If anyone has any idea on how to fix this, please let me know. =/

i have been experiencing the same thing for a couple days now to, i've deleted old drivers and reinstalled the latest version, i still get fps drop, also i have a gtx 1060 3gb, so i know i shouldn't have any problems. plus when i first installed the game a while back on this new pc i was reaching 300+ uncapped. now i can barely stay at 120 capped.
I posted my issue in another thread, but I've also experienced the same thing.  I left for vacation and came back to a buggy game

Update: I sent in a Support Ticket and the tech support told me "I would like you to perform a clean reinstall of your graphics drivers. It looks like yours haven't been updated for a while." 
I've made sure my graphics card was up to date several times but I guess I'll try it. 

I'll let you guys know if it fixed the problem or not. x__x
Annnd the graphics card update actually made the problem worse AND my computer blue screen. -__-

What you're describing are pretty common symptoms of *Packet Loss* or high buffering problems. Before we take a deep look at your route to our servers, I'd like you to configure your local network settings for League using our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

Please let me know if this caused any noticeable change for you.

There were a few minor things on the test but the rest were green and listed as "ok". My internet has been perfectly fine and I've experienced packet loss before and this isn't it. (My internet gets completely messed up when it's packet loss.) 

I'm already in a wired connection and I ran the Hextech Repair tool a couple weeks ago. Everything else I have already done to try to improve my game but since the last update that's when the FPS drops and champ animation delays began. I even tried it on the old client to see if that would help and it didn't. =/

Since you're still seeing issues after taking those steps, I recommend reaching out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and attaching a set of logs using our [**HRT App**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367). One of our tech specialists will be able to work with you further to resolve this.

Let me know if you have any issues taking those steps.
